creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: orange, purple, black, green; covers neck and ears with long flaps and ties; three dimensional face with teeth and fangs; blue and pink eyes; embroidered white nose; white whiskers; stiff ears; red tongue; orange and black tail; all on orange satin with black and blue floral, sewn-on braids; corded chin strap; pink lining; silver paper for eye centers and edging of butterfly in center of forehead; some outlining in metallic thread; white metal bell on back
title: Child's Hat
